data.actual_result: The scrollbar does not reach the bottom of the screen
data.expected_result: Scrollbar should be at the bottom as well as the results
data.short_description: When reaching the bottom of the search results, the scrollbar is stuck mid-air
data.steps_to_repro: - Get update 6.2.9. It contains a fix for the bug where padding is missing at bottom of search results. - Search for something in a server, enough so you can scroll through results but not too many results either - Scroll down, and when you reach the bottom of the results, look at the scrollbar
